thread.title: Meet the porn star-turned-fantasy sports phenom
thread.title_full: Meet the porn star-turned-fantasy sports phenom | New York Post

author: Jaclyn Hendricks
title: Meet the porn star-turned-fantasy sports phenom
text:
XRCO Awards #LA 
A photo posted by Lisa Ann (@thereallisaann) on Apr 16, 2014 at 8:31pm PDT 
The fantasy sports world knows Lisa Ann for quite a different body of work.
As a former adult film star, Ann made a name for herself starring in approximately 500 racy flicks, once registering as the most-searched porn personality in the world. But instead of retreating to her four-story Los Angeles condo in retirement, the busty 5-foot-2 beauty sashayed into another game: fantasy sports.
As the host of â€œLisa Ann Does Fantasyâ€ on Sirius XM radio twice a week, Ann is a natural behind the mic. And while she credits the Dallas Cowboys and her dad for schooling her in Football 101, bedding hundreds of athletes over a 15-year span definitely boosted her sports IQ.
â€œSheâ€™s different,â€ a pro athlete spilled to Fox Sportsâ€™ Flinder Boyd . â€œSheâ€™s the type of person who takes command. If I need advice, Iâ€™ll call her, and I listen to what she tells me.â€
Another great show tonight on Lisa Ann Does Fantasy on Sirius Fantasy Sports Network ğŸˆBig Week in Fantasy Football. Time to work the waiver wires! ğŸˆ 
A photo posted by Lisa Ann (@thereallisaann) on Sep 29, 2014 at 10:10pm PDT 
Annâ€™s charm isnâ€™t limited to football flings. Franchise brass are known to perk up as well.
â€œIâ€™ll sit in the family room or green room beforehand and start talking to play-by-play guys or coaches or agents that walk by,â€ Ann said in the excellent profile piece . â€œMost of them think theyâ€™re going to fâ€“k me the whole time. And 99 percent of them never will, but Iâ€™m willing to fight that battle to get to know stuff about these teams.â€
As for the pros who turn her down (yes, they do exist), the brunette bombshell confesses she isnâ€™t afraid to bring in reinforcements for some extra convincing.
â€œI couldnâ€™t get this playerâ€™s attention. I tried everything. So I decided to go to [an NBA] game with two Playboy bunnies at my side,â€ Ann says. â€œI looked like this tiny little girl next to them. But at halftime, the team assistant came up to me and said, â€˜[He] wants to meet you after the game.â€™ I got my guy.â€
While itâ€™s unclear if she and the baller ever tangoed off the court, Ann shares that she is still on the hunt for her very own MVP.
â€œThe thing is, everyone wants to be with me,â€ she said. â€œBut no one wants to be with me.â€
Care to get in line, guys?
My Baseball Story.. âš¾ï¸ So you know this was my first season learning, reading, following & studying Baseball. Tho I had been to games, I never really understood the sport & with my new knowledge I have found my love & respect for the game. TONIGHT I wore my first piece of @mets Gear "Murphy" jersey. I have attended 4 Mets Games this year & they have won all 4. I decided today, I would wear my gear & if they won, I would make the Mets My Team. âš¾ï¸ it's hard to be a fan and not pick sides. I have enjoyed a long season of just watching so many teams, but I think it started that day when I met Mr Met! âš¾ï¸ That's my baseball story. âš¾ï¸
